description: Character species with diverse options from various cultures and mythologies. Used for filtering and categorizing characters.

High Elf.name: High Elf
High Elf.description: Noble elf with strong magical abilities

Dwarf.name: Dwarf
Dwarf.description: Short, stout humanoid skilled in crafting

Halfling.name: Halfling
Halfling.description: Small, peaceful humanoid with hairy feet

Gnome.name: Gnome
Gnome.description: Small humanoid with inventiveness and illusion magic

Orc.name: Orc
Orc.description: Aggressive humanoid with green skin and tusks

Half-Orc.name: Half-Orc
Half-Orc.description: Human-orc hybrid with strength and cunning

Tiefling.name: Tiefling
Tiefling.description: Humanoid with fiendish ancestry, horns and tail

Dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
Dragonborn.description: Draconic humanoid with scales and breath weapon

Kobold.name: Kobold
Kobold.description: Small, reptilian humanoid with traps expertise

Fairy.name: Fairy
Fairy.description: Small winged humanoid with magical dust

Pixie.name: Pixie
Pixie.description: Tiny mischievous humanoid with insect wings

Nymph.name: Nymph
Nymph.description: Nature spirit bound to a location

Dryad.name: Dryad
Dryad.description: Tree spirit with deep forest connection

Centaur.name: Centaur
Centaur.description: Half-human, half-horse from the waist down

Naga.name: Naga
Naga.description: Humanoid upper body with serpent tail

Lamia.name: Lamia
Lamia.description: Female humanoid with snake lower body

Mermaid.name: Mermaid
Mermaid.description: Female merfolk with beautiful singing voice

Siren.name: Siren
Siren.description: Dangerous singer who lures sailors to doom

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.description: Human who transforms into wolf under full moon

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.description: Undead being that feeds on blood

Zombie.name: Zombie
Zombie.description: Reanimated corpse with hunger for brains

Lich.name: Lich
Lich.description: Powerful undead spellcaster with a phylactery

Specter.name: Specter
Specter.description: Malevolent spirit with energy draining ability

Skeleton.name: Skeleton
Skeleton.description: Animated bones of a deceased creature

Banshee.name: Banshee
Banshee.description: Female spirit whose wail foretells death

Dragon.name: Dragon
Dragon.description: Large flying reptile with magical powers

Wyvern.name: Wyvern
Wyvern.description: Two-legged dragon relative with poisonous tail

Phoenix.name: Phoenix
Phoenix.description: Immortal bird reborn from its own ashes

Hydra.name: Hydra
Hydra.description: Multi-headed serpent that grows two heads when one is cut

Chimera.name: Chimera
Chimera.description: Three-headed monster with lion, goat, and snake parts

Sphinx.name: Sphinx
Sphinx.description: Lion with human head, keeper of riddles

Unicorn.name: Unicorn
Unicorn.description: Pure white horse with a spiraling horn

Kirin.name: Kirin
Kirin.description: Japanese unicorn-like creature of good omens

Kitsune.name: Kitsune
Kitsune.description: Japanese fox spirit with multiple tails

Tanuki.name: Tanuki
Tanuki.description: Japanese raccoon dog with shapeshifting ability

Oni.name: Oni
Oni.description: Japanese demon with horns and club

Kappa.name: Kappa
Kappa.description: Japanese water imp with dish-like head

Yokai.name: Yokai
Yokai.description: Japanese spirit or demon of various forms

Raiju.name: Raiju
Raiju.description: Japanese thunder beast in form of wolf or cat

Elemental.name: Elemental
Elemental.description: Pure embodiment of a natural element

Earth Elemental.name: Earth Elemental
Earth Elemental.description: Living stone and earth with crushing strength

Golem.name: Golem
Golem.description: Animated construct of clay, stone, or metal

Demon.name: Demon
Demon.description: Fiendish creature from the lower planes

Fallen Angel.name: Fallen Angel
Fallen Angel.description: Angel cast out from divine realm

Devil.name: Devil
Devil.description: Powerful fiend from the Nine Hells

Succubus.name: Succubus
Succubus.description: Seductive demon that feeds on life force

Incubus.name: Incubus
Incubus.description: Male demon that seduces in dreams

Changeling.name: Changeling
Changeling.description: Fairy child left in place of stolen human

Other.name: Other
Other.description: Species not fitting any other category
